byline.contributor: Alissa J. Rubin reported from Beirut, Karam Shoumali from Istanbul and Eric Schmitt from Washington. Hwaida Saad contributed reporting from Beirut, and Safak Timur from Istanbul.
byline.original: By ALISSA J. RUBIN, KARAM SHOUMALI and ERIC SCHMITT

lead_paragraph: The service member was killed by an improvised explosive device on Thursday, the United States military said.
snippet: The service member was killed by an improvised explosive device on Thursday, the United States military said....

headline.main: American Is Killed in First Casualty for U.S. Forces in Syria Combat
headline.print_headline: American Dies in Syria, Becoming First Combat Casualty for U.S. Force
